todos.title: Write Handbook
todos.description: The product handbook needs an initial draft written.  Work with the team to identify content, design a layout, and import content into the layout.

todos.title: Plan Party
todos.description: We're going to celebrate the arrival of our new hires with a party, but we don't know what kind of party to throw.  Gather some ideas from the team, do the initial investigation of those ideas, select one, and plan it out.

todos.title: Install New System
todos.description: Our existing system isn't meeting the needs of our department.  We recently procured a replacement system, but it needs to be installed and configured.

todos.title: Order Coffee
todos.description: Every Friday, we go out for coffee as a team building exercise.  Gather up everyone's orders for the week and send them over to the coffeehouse ahead of our meetup.
